# 👩‍💼 About Me

Hi, I'm **Nu Nu Tun, PMP®**, an experienced IT professional currently pursuing an MBA at **University Canada West**. I bring over a decade of experience in software development, system analysis, and project management, mainly within Singapore's tech industry. My goal is to bridge technology with business leadership to drive innovation.
